EmailTemplate.name: Digital Time Test Campaign.Email 01
EmailTemplate.subject: Internal Clickthrough Testing - Digital Time Website
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> People no longer buy products; they expect experiences that will entertain, educate and engage Shaping the future
In the digital world, everything must be immediate, intelligent and intuitive. But advances in technology don’t necessarily mean faster, smarter and better. Today, time is still in short supply and productivity growth is stuck in the slow lane.
- Click this link to test visits to a Marketo Landing Page read more <[[https://pages.nokia.com/Digital-Time-Test-Campaign_Digital-Time-Test-Campaign-Landing-Page.html]]> - Look inside the technologies helping digital service providers act in digital time read more <[[https://networks.nokia.com/digital-time/intelligent-care-digital-moment]]> - Take a moment to learn what the experts think read more <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/blog/just-digital-time-future-csps]]> Your Nokia Team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
